price: 36. Мре tokutaki sé ndako moko ya mpamba ya baye bamisokia.
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
